name: Will You Die 2: Murderer Mystery
description:
Welcome to Will You Die 2: Murderer Mystery.

This is the sequel to the first powerpoint game, Will You Die?

In Will You Die 2, you will navigate through a realm of the mind, constantly being pestered and consulted by your subconscious. 

This game requires Microsoft powerpoint to play.

All sounds were used from the Microsoft Powerpoint system.

To prevent cheating, only click inside of the designated areas.

A develop will be released soon on the creation of the Will You Die saga so far.
